sentences.sContent: The U.N. had been cooperating with the State Department on a plan to find countries willing to take the refugees.
sentences.sCn: 联合国和美国国务院合作，制定计划来寻找愿意接纳难民的国家。

remMethod.val: co(共同)+oper(工作)+ate→一起工作→合作

trans.tranOther: If you cooperate with someone, you work with them or help them for a particular purpose. You can also say that two people cooperate.
